"...Zeno!? ....Of course not. It's <%me>: "Sorry for the confusion. I'm retracing Zeno's footsteps... and ended up here."
"Since he's taking his sweet time, I thought I'd speed things up and go to him, y'know?"
"...but I kinda need to know where he is first before I can meet him."
"...Huh? How can you be so confident? You trying to cheer me up?"
"Well, thanks. I should be the one giving encouragement... I guess I fail as your superior."
"...Heh, you could at least lie a little to cheer me up."
"But you'd need to put some feeling into it. I wouldn't fall for that dull act!"
"When was it exactly? Since I've changed to Hunter? Or since Zeno disappeared?"
"It's like I've got the freedom now to see the bigger picture, or to read other people's thoughts."
"That's why I was able to pick up on your act, a little. But... thank you."
"A-hem! I can't keep this sour face forever!"
"Since I'm filling Zeno's shoes, I've got to get it together! See ya!"
